name: Pricing Calculator in Notion Template
description: Not sure what to charge for your services? This pricing calculator has you covered.This template is a step-by-step guide broken down into 4 sections:Calculate ExpensesCalculate Pricing per hourCalculate Pricing per ServiceReview before implementationThe template itself includes 3 databases. By the end, you will have a clear pricing strategy that accounts for holidays, expenses and helps you avoid burnout.
features: Calculate Expenses; Calculate Pricing per hour; Calculate Pricing per Service; Review before implementation
